Package util

Class alertCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.alertCheck
  • public class alertCheck
extends java.lang.Object
    Method contains classes for checking time overlap, if an appointment is within 15min of the user logging into the program.Also contains a method that checks if an appointment time is between opening and closing times.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      alertCheck()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean businessHourCheck​(java.time.LocalTime time)
      Method takes in a time parameter and checks if the time is between the opening and closing time.
      static boolean dayCheck​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Method checks if the day for any appointment is today and if it matches with the current date, then returns true.
      static boolean intervalAlert​(java.time.LocalTime startTime)
      Method takes a local date time and checks if it is within 15min of the user logging into the application.
      static boolean timeOverLapCheck​(java.time.LocalDateTime selectedStart, java.time.LocalDateTime selectedEnd, java.lang.Integer customerID, java.lang.Integer appointmentID, java.lang.Integer switchCase)
      Method takes selected start, end times and the customer ID and checks if there are any conflicting times for that user.

    • Method Detail

      • timeOverLapCheck

        public static boolean timeOverLapCheck​(java.time.LocalDateTime selectedStart,
                                       java.time.LocalDateTime selectedEnd,
                                       java.lang.Integer customerID,
                                       java.lang.Integer appointmentID,
                                       java.lang.Integer switchCase)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method takes selected start, end times and the customer ID and checks if there are any conflicting times for that user.
        Parameters:
        selectedStart - Selected start time from the appointment selected by the user when updating an appointment.
        selectedEnd - Selected end time from the appointment selected by the user when updating an appointment.
        customerID - Selected Customer ID from the appointment that is selected by the user when updating the appointment.\
        appointmentID - Appointment ID provided from the update method to compare against another appointment in the table.
        switchCase - Number provided by the add and update method to be used the correct switch statement to add or update an appointment record.
        Returns:
        Returns a false if a time overlap is not detected and true if an overlap is detected.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL error when an error is found within the SQL query.

      • intervalAlert

        public static boolean intervalAlert​(java.time.LocalTime startTime)
        Method takes a local date time and checks if it is within 15min of the user logging into the application.
        Parameters:
        startTime - Start time of appointments to check if login time is within 15min of the user logging in.
        Returns:
        Returns true if time logging in and start time are within 15min of each other. Returns false if start and loggin time are not within 15min.

      • businessHourCheck

        public static boolean businessHourCheck​(java.time.LocalTime time)
        Method takes in a time parameter and checks if the time is between the opening and closing time.
        Parameters:
        time - Time varaiable that is checked between the start and end times.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean if the time is between the start and end time. Returns true if time is between start and end time. Returns false if time is before start or after end time.

      • dayCheck

        public static boolean dayCheck​(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Method checks if the day for any appointment is today and if it matches with the current date, then returns true.
        Parameters:
        date - Date Parameter from the date of the appointments.
        Returns:
        Returns True if the date matches todays date and if returns false, then no match is found.
